name: SAMURAI Survivor -Undefeated Blade
description:
■ Over 40 types of weapons & relics
There are over 40 types of weapons and relics to help players gain an advantage in battle. Weapons increase the player's attack methods, while relics enhance their abilities. A wide variety of combinations increases the tactical aspect of gameplay.

■ Status Distribution System
Players earn status points when leveling up. They can freely allocate these points to customize their characters according to their playstyle. Enhance various stats such as "strength," "endurance," and "intelligence" to create synergistic effects with weapons and relics.

■ The "Dash" feature
In "SAMURAI Survivor," the dash function is equipped to avoid enemy attacks and quickly move around the battlefield. Mastering the dash will make combat smoother and enable more effective tactics. There are also weapons and relics that enhance the dash.

■ Watercolor-style setting
The setting of this game features delicate and beautiful watercolor-style graphics. Characters, enemies, and items are also uniquely depicted in a watercolor-like touch, allowing players to enjoy beautiful visuals while progressing through the game.


　　　　　
【Dual-Wielding】Wandering Female Swordsman - Ayane -
Ayane is a swordsman with both human and demon blood, specializing in dual-wielding. She possesses exceptional sword skills and embraces her half-demon identity to protect people. She is brave and strong, never compromising her beliefs and overcoming many hardships.

【Greatsword】Fox-Possessed Girl - Suou -
Suou is a charming fox-possessed girl with the ability to coexist with nature and sharp combat skills. She wields a greatsword to sweep away enemies. Innocent and adorable in appearance, she is calm and courageous in battle. She loves spending time in nature, controlling its power at will and launching precise attacks on enemies.

【Iaido】Sorrowful Flower Blooming with the Demon Blade - Sayoko -
Once frail and plagued by illness, Sayoko swore revenge on the demon that attacked her lover, and obtained the legendary demon blade "Eigou Ichimonji" transforming her into an iaido master. With numerous dashes and agility, her distinctive fighting style consists of a slashing attack after a slight delay from her initial movement, striking down demons at your command.
